long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Elon tweets. Tired of seeing Elon Musk on your Twitter feed? You mute him, block him, and yet he still shows up? This extension does the impossible—it hides all his tweets!
